data.title: Turn everything into a realtime multiplayer app
data.content:
PartyKit - Turn everything into a realtime multiplayer app
===============
     

🇺🇸

🇹🇭

🇯🇵

[PartyKit](https://www.partykit.io/)
====================================

[Docs](https://docs.partykit.io/) [Pricing](https://www.partykit.io/#pricing-header) [Blog](https://blog.partykit.io/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/partykit_io) [GitHub](https://github.com/partykit/partykit/) [Discord](https://discord.gg/GJwKKTcQ7W)

PartyKit is an open source deployment platform for AI agents, multiplayer and local-first apps, games and websites.
===================================================================================================================

3×🎈

**Everything  
is better with  

collaboration

realtime

**

Add PartyKit to a new project

```
// 1. Install with npm
npm install partykit

// 2. Write your code
export default class Server {
  onMessage(message, websocket) {
    websocket.send("pong");
  }
  onRequest(request) {
    return new Response(`This is room ${party.id}`);
  }
}

// 3. Develop on localhost
npx partykit dev server.js

// 4. Deploy to the edge
npx partykit deploy server.js --name first-party

// 5. Try it out
curl 'https://first-party.{yourname}.partykit.dev/party/my-room'
```

[Developer docs](https://docs.partykit.io/quickstart) [Join our Discord](https://discord.gg/g5uqHQJc3z)

### Add PartyKit to everything

It works well with with popular collaboration frameworks and libraries. Y.js, Automerge, Replicache, XState, tldraw, TinyBase, they all Just Work™.

### It’s platform agnostic

PartyKit integrates with your current setup. Plays nicely with Vercel, Netlify, AWS, Cloudflare, fly.io, or wherever you host your app. No big rewrite needed.

### And standards based

WebSockets, Fetch, Request-Response, Wasm. PartyKit uses web standards to guarantee interoperability with all your tools, now and in the future.

Made with PartyKit
------------------

by Stately

Deploy State Machines to the Edge with Stately Sky

[Read more](https://stately.ai/blog/2023-11-13-introducing-stately-sky)

Make AI your expert customer support agent

Everything you need to know to ship modern full-stack web applications

Does Cool Thing X, integrates with Service Y

Why PartyKit?
-------------

### More flexible

You bring the code, we do the hosting. Use any package from npm, or write your own servers from scratch.

### More functional

Analytics, staging environments, secrets management, logging. All the tools your team needs to build production apps.

### More fast

A worldwide edge network with low latency, anywhere on Earth. We enable your ambition, from your first user to millions.

> I did a bunch of work recently with Y.js and PartyKit and can confirm it made some of the most difficult parts a breeze. You should 100% try it out at least if it’s relevant to what you’re building.

![Image 7](https://www.partykit.io/assets/users/brandon.jpeg)

[Brandon Dail](https://twitter.com/aweary) Staff Engineer, Discord

> It’s the future of workflows.

![Image 8](https://www.partykit.io/assets/users/davidk.jpeg)

[David Khourshid](https://twitter.com/DavidKPiano) Founder, Stately

> I have been trying to solve a real-time sync problem for SiteGPT for months now. I tried everything and nothing seemed to work properly. Sunil solved my entire problem using PartyKit in around 10 lines of code 🤯 10 lines... and I am not even exaggerating 😅 PartyKit is awesome!!

![Image 9](https://www.partykit.io/assets/users/bhanu.jpeg)

[Bhanu Teja P](https://twitter.com/pbteja1998) Founder, SiteGPT

> Oh god this is so easy

![Image 10](https://www.partykit.io/assets/users/adam.jpeg)

[Adam Janiš](https://twitter.com/adam_janis) Staff Engineer, Kiwi.com

> A breeze to set up 🙂 Just takes less than 40 lines of code to do! Looking forward to the future of PartyKit!

![Image 11](https://www.partykit.io/assets/users/yousef.jpeg)

[Yousef El-Dardiry](https://twitter.com/YousefED) Maintainer, BlockNote.js

> We’ve been having a blast using PartyKit at StatelyAI for a little while. It makes implementing real-time a breeze. Try it on your next thing 🎉

![Image 12](https://www.partykit.io/assets/users/anders.jpeg)

[Anders Bech Mellson](https://twitter.com/andersmellson) Developer, Stately

Pricing
-------

### Individual

Obviously, Free

*   Deploy to our global edge platform
*   Great for small projects
*   Storage gets cleared every 24 hours

*   Up to 10 live projects

[Get started](https://docs.partykit.io/quickstart/)

* * *

### Commercial

Surprise, also Free\*

*   [\* If you deploy to your own Cloudflare account](https://docs.partykit.io/guides/deploy-to-cloudflare/)
*   Custom domains
*   Unlimited projects

*   Pay only your Cloudflare usage

[Get started](https://docs.partykit.io/quickstart/)

* * *

Blog
----

### [PartyKit is joining Cloudflare!](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/partykit-is-joining-cloudflare/)

Fri Apr 05 2024

PartyKit is happy to announce that we're joining Cloudflare to build the future of stateful serverless computing

* * *

### [Prompt engineering is better with expert friends — Wordware ⨉ PartyKit 🎈](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/collaborative-llm-prompting-with-wordware/)

Thu Apr 04 2024

* * *

### [Introducing PartyKit starter kits, minimal and full fat](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/introducing-starter-kits/)

Thu Feb 22 2024

\`npm create partykit@latest\` is now the best way to get started with PartyKit. Choose from five templates.

* * *

### [Using Vectorize to build an unreasonably good search engine in 160 lines of code](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/using-vectorize-to-build-search/)

Tue Jan 09 2024

PartyKit now includes a vector database and access to an embedding model. Here’s a guide on how to use them to build a search engine.

* * *

### [🎈 ⤫ 🤖 Introducing PartyKit AI: Unleashing the Future of Collaborative AI](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/announcing-partykit-ai/)

Tue Jan 09 2024

A selection of LLMs and a vector database directly in the PartyKit environment, available today.

* * *

### [Cursor party! Get multiplayer cursors on your own website](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/cursor-party/)

Thu Dec 14 2023

Cursor Party is a new PartyKit project for you to add presence to your website (even static sites) with a single script tag. Oh and it has cursor chat too.

* * *

### [Partycore (everything’s better at 140bpm)](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/partycore-140bpm-with-tonejs/)

Tue Dec 05 2023

We’ve built a multiplayer drum machine demo with Tone.js and Yjs. It’s a ton of fun. Here’s how it works.

* * *

### [Party.IO — a new Socket.IO backend for PartyKit](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/party-io-a-socket-io-backend-for-partykit/)

Thu Nov 30 2023

We are super excited to announce the release of Party.IO, a Socket.IO backend for PartyKit!

* * *

### [PartyKit orchestrates Stately's machines in the Sky](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/partykit-orchestrates-stately/)

Wed Nov 15 2023

Anders Bech Mellson explains how PartyKit has enabled bringing state machines to the Stately Sky 🌤️

* * *

### [What is Flow, and Why is Partykit being a crucial player?](https://blog.partykit.io/posts/flow-and-partykit-collaboration/)

Fri Oct 27 2023

Making the browser multiplayer is difficult. However, Flow and Partykit's collaboration brings multiplayer to a single website.

* * *

[More blog posts](https://blog.partykit.io/)

Turn anything into a  
**real-time collaborative web app**
----------------------------------------------------------

The future of the internet is collaborative, and PartyKit is here to help every developer be part of it.

“The Web doesn't just connect machines, it connects people”  
[Tim Berners-Lee](https://webfoundation.org/about/community/knight-2008-tbl-speech/)
